attributes.action: Remove the UK from the anti British policies of the EU and the inconsistance of the enforcement of their laws.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has now been revealed that Britain is being punished for overfishing of Herring and mackerel while the French, who also over fish tuna, are not to be so punished. This has now exposed the anti British attitued of the commision and is the best reason to leave the EU, the membership of which we have yet to be consulted about.
